    ! Replace comma with space
    if (c == ',') then

    ! Output

end program main

program main
    implicit none

    character(len=10000) :: input_line
    integer :: N, i, pos, count=0
    character(len=100) :: token

        found = .false.
        do i=pos, len_trim(input_line)
            if (input_line(i:i) == ' ') then
                found = .true.
                exit
            end if
        end do
        if (found) then
            token = input_line(pos:i-1)
            count = count +1
            if (trim(token) == '0') exit
            pos = i+1
        else
            token = input_line(pos:)
            count = count +1
            if (trim(token) == '0') exit

end program main
